content.raw:
Actually, that's almost exactly what the [world cloning feature](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=clone_simulation&cat=physics) does. It creates a new world and starts a new server. We would just have to change the physics profile and physics engine in the new world.

Simulation cloning doesn't fully work though; the models velocities and plugin states do not persist.
content.html:
Actually, that's almost exactly what the world cloning feature does. It creates a new world and starts a new server. We would just have to change the physics profile and physics engine in the new world.

Simulation cloning doesn't fully work though; the models velocities and plugin states do not persist.
